title: Most Controversial Final of 2025? Headbutts, Yellow Cards, Crashes, and Repentant Organizers at Brugge-De Panne
content:
'This hurts my heart': Officials vow to investigate hazardous final after 'Super Bowl of the Sprinters' obliterated by crashes and heavy injuries.

Read the full article at Most Controversial Final of 2025? Headbutts, Yellow Cards, Crashes, and Repentant Organizers at Brugge-De Panne on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
